last_episode_to_air.name: Lovers or Liars
last_episode_to_air.overview: In the absolutely stunning series finale, the lovers and liars' identities are revealed and things get messy. Meanwhile, the boys regret their untimely decisions and one woman makes the most dramatic choice in the history of Lovers and Liars.

name: Lovers and Liars
overview: Three single men on a tropical island must determine which of the 24 women are there for love or cash in order to win $100,000.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: In The CW’s dating competition show LOVERS AND LIARS, 24 women join three men on a tropical island for a chance to fall in love and win $100,000. Half of the women are looking for love, but the other half are just there to deceive the men and win the cold hard cash. Will the men be able to separate the lovers from the liars in order to win love AND money?

episodes.name: Women Are Too Good
episodes.overview: Three men embark on a quest to find a real connection with one of 24 beautiful women. One half of the women have good intentions to find love. The other half are women ready to lie their way to $100K. The competition is fierce, and the strategy is pure art.

episodes.name: I'm Not Ready for This Convo
episodes.overview: With the first dates underway, the well-manicured claws come out! CJ and Casey's old player ways die hard, while Benedict finds himself smack in the middle of drama between The Powerpuff Girls and the Jazmanian Devil.

episodes.name: Rave Crashers
episodes.overview: The Guys realize their radar for an honest woman is way off. Nikki throws a rave for the island, but spoils everything by inviting some new players to the game. And all hell breaks loose when Elizabeth makes a failed play for Benedict.

episodes.name: Call Me Toxic
episodes.overview: The game heats up as the women question Camille's intentions with Casey. After a great first date, one woman sparks big doubts for all of the others falling for Benedict's charms. CJ catches feelings for a new gal on a water adventure.

episodes.name: You Can Look, but You Can't DM
episodes.overview: The pressure to decipher lovers from liars is mounting so the men welcome help from Nikki Glaser and her WiFi. Shocking info is revealed! The guys confront the women who will say and do anything to stay in the game but for three of them, it's not enough.

episodes.name: Who is Bill Murray?
episodes.overview: A classic game of Douchetank proves these women did not come here to make friends. The liars bring their A-game and everyone gets defensive. The men may not believe everything they hear, but it has an unexpected impact on who they choose for their dates.

episodes.name: I Put a Spell on You
episodes.overview: CJ thinks he can trust his final 3 women, but one of them stuns Nikki in a therapy session. Casey really likes Hannah so Camille and Michi cast a spell to stop love in its tracks. Eliminations are turned upside down and Benedict reaches a breaking point.

episodes.name: Failure Swift
episodes.overview: Forced to share the men with their competition on group dates, tensions between the ladies reach an all-time high! Nikki Glaser surprises with a riveting performance. Tough choices are made and the men shock everyone with their final eliminations.

episodes.name: The Claws Are Out
episodes.overview: Things get sexy and dangerous between the women and the men; Nikki Glaser makes an appearance; a woman becomes scorned.

episodes.name: Lovers or Liars
episodes.overview: In the absolutely stunning series finale, the lovers and liars' identities are revealed and things get messy. Meanwhile, the boys regret their untimely decisions and one woman makes the most dramatic choice in the history of Lovers and Liars.

Half of the women are looking for love, but the other half are just there to deceive the men and win the cold hard cash. Will the men be able to separate the lovers from the liars in order to win love AND money?
